channel.title: rice on level99cooking
channel.description: Recent content in rice on level99cooking

item.title: Chicken Dragon Bowl
item.description: Chicken Dragon Bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: Chicken breast...........1 LB Kewpie mayo..............3 tbsp Siracha..................1 tbsp Sushi rice...............2 cups Garlic chili sauce.......1/4 cup Soy sauce................1/4 cup Brow Sugar...............1/4 cup Rice vinegar.............1 tbsp Sesame seeds (optional) Cookware Rice cooker (Optional) Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker (2 Cups) Dice chicken (1LB). Mix Soy sauce (1/4 Cup), Brown Sugar (1/4 Cup), Garlic chili sauce (1/4 Cup), and rice vinegar (1 tbsp), and diced chicken.

item.title: Salmon Pokebowl
item.description: Poke bowl servings: 2 cook time: 25 minutes Ingredients: kewpie mayo..............3 tbsp mini cucumbers...........2 pepper rice vinegar.............1 tsp salmon...................1/4-1/2 pound salt scallions seaweed sesame seeds siracha..................1 tbsp soy sauce................1 tbsp sushi rice...............2 cups garlic chili sauce.......2 cups Cookware: Rice cooker Pan Chopsticks Steps: Start cooking sushi rice in rice cooker sushi rice: 2 cups Cut mini cucumbers into thin slices, put into bowl and splash with rice vinegar, siracha, soy sauce.
